ParameterFields.Name: Interior Room Number
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Which room of the destination stage to take the player into when they enter the ship.

What the destination stage is depends on the Exit Index specified in the ship's DZB collision file.
If the Exit Index is 62, the destination stage will be 'Obshop' (Beedle's Shop Ship).
If the Exit Index is 59, the destination stage will be 'Abship' (Submarines).

ParameterFields.Name: Interior Spawn ID
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Which spawn ID of the room in destination stage to spawn the player at when they enter the ship.

What the destination stage is depends on the Exit Index specified in the ship's DZB collision file.
If the Exit Index is 62, the destination stage will be 'Obshop' (Beedle's Shop Ship).
If the Exit Index is 59, the destination stage will be 'Abship' (Submarines).
